 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַר‎</span>] **verb** ==surround== (in **Pi\`el**), (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּתַּר‎</span> Pa\`el, ***wait, hope*** for; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el ***wait, await, remain:*** i.e. perhaps ***surrounded expectantly***, see [[Job.36.2|Job 36:2]] below) — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתְּרוּ‎</span> [[Judg.20.43|Judg 20:43]] of ***surrounding*** an enemy; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתְּרוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.22.13|Ps 22:13]] (in figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבָבוּנִי‎</span>); ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּתַּרלִֿי‎</span> [[Job.36.2|Job 36:2]] ***wait, I pray*** (as in Aramaic) **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּי יַכְּתִּרוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַדִּיקִים‎</span> [[Ps.142.8|Ps 142:8]] dubious, ***throw out crowns*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53g»§ 53g</sup>), i.e. appear with crowns (denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּתֶר‎</span>; but this very late — only in Esther); figurative for ***triumph***, because of me; but [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְפָּֽאֲרוּ‎</span> (see  I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פאר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכְתִּרוּ דָ֑עַת‎</span> [[Prov.14.18|Prov 14:18]] dubious, [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others ***throw out knowledge as a crown***, make knowledge their crown (denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּתֶר‎</span>; but see above), [[BDB#Now|Now]], ***encompass knowledge***, i.e. possess it (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽחֲלוּ‎</span>); sense good, but meaning of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> without \|\|. ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכְתִּיר‎</span> ***surrounding*** (as **Pi\`el**) [[Hab.1.4|Hab 1:4]] (with accusative of enemy).
